name: createEntity
description: Breaks a create entity command into structured parts. Used to create a new folder or collection in a module.

name.description: The exact name of the item to create

module.description: The module to create the items in

tags.description: The tags to assign to the created items

description.description: The description to assign to the created items

explainer.description: Explain what action is going to be taken in a human readable sentence. Example: 'Creating an entity named Sunset in Photos'
